LanguageData.ActivityDangerousDesc: These entities are at dangerously high activity levels
LanguageData.ActivityDangerousDescAppended: When an entity reaches 100% activity, it will become dangerous.\n\nSend your warden to suppress these entities, or enable automatic suppression using the entity's activity panel.
LanguageData.NeedAnomalyProjectDesc: You have an entity marked for study but don't have a matching anomaly research project selected:
LanguageData.NeedAnomalyProjectDescAppended:
Open the research menu and select a project on the anomaly tab.

You can have a basic and an advanced research project selected at the same time.

(Click to open the research menu.)
LanguageData.CreepJoinerTimeoutDesc: The following visitors feel ignored and are becoming increasingly upset
LanguageData.CreepJoinerTimeoutDescAppended: Select a colonist and right-click on the visitor.\n\nAct quickly... they don't like being ignored.
LanguageData.Alert_UndercaveUnstableDesc: The undercave has become unstable and will collapse soon.\n\nGet your colonists out before it's too late.
LanguageData.Alert_CultistPsychicRitualDesc: {INVOKER_kindDef} {INVOKER_nameDef} has started to perform {RITUAL_definite} ritual. If you don't interrupt {INVOKER_objective}, the consequences could be dire.
LanguageData.AlertMeatHungerDesc: These ghouls hunger for raw meat
LanguageData.AlertMeatHungerDescAppended: They may attack if they're not fed soon. Get them some meat.
LanguageData.AlertEmergingPitGateDesc: The ground is collapsing in on itself. A pit gate will soon form.
LanguageData.Alert_InsufficientContainmentDesc: The following entities are being held in rooms that do not meet their minimum containment strength
LanguageData.Alert_InsufficientContainmentDescAppende: They will escape soon. Build stronger walls, doors, or other containment devices to hold them.
LanguageData.AlertHoldingPlatformDesc: Build holding platforms or place holding spots to contain and study captured entities.
LanguageData.AlertCubeWithdrawalDesc: The following people are suffering from cube withdrawal
LanguageData.AlertCubeWithdrawalDescAppended: Their skin itches and their mind races, craving closeness to the golden cube. Their symptoms will worsen until they can play with the cube.\n\nEnsure that they have free time and can reach the golden cube.
LanguageData.AlertDigestionDesc: The following people or creatures are being digested by a devourer
LanguageData.AlertDigestionDescAppended: Kill the devourer to release them before it's too late.
LanguageData.AlertInhibitorBlockedDesc: One of your electric inhibitors is not functional because it’s blocked by another building.\n\nClear the space in front of the electric inhibitor.
LanguageData.AlertGrayFleshSampleDesc: You’ve discovered a strip of fleshy tissue. Analyze it to learn more about the biosignature.
LanguageData.AlertNeuralLumpDesc: A fleshmass nerve bundle has dropped a neural lump. Analyze it to learn how to kill the fleshmass heart.
LanguageData.AlertRevenantFleshDesc: The wounded revenant left behind a piece of itself. Analyze it to learn how to track the revenant.
